attributes.action: Stop Insurance companies taking away u.k drivers no claims bonuses after 2 years
attributes.additional_details: The current rules have the potential to affect all drivers in the U.K. and could see thousands of pounds added on to a individuals Insurance premium should their no claims bonus become invalid, you may Stop driving for a couple of years for one reason or another and upon returning you then discover that your Insurance company have swallowed up your no claims bonus and have left you with no choice but to start all over again with the added cost, lets together put a stop to this.
attributes.background: U.K drivers are being penalized when returning to driving after 2 years and have to pay thousands of pounds more over what they did  previously through no fault of their own as the rules currently stand, this is a non-ethical practice which only helps Insurance companies further line their pockets.
